item.title: Pythagorean triples
item.dc:creator: Jeremiah Perry
item.description:
I was looking for a way to generate Pythagorean triples and figured there had to be some sort of formula or algorithm. And of course there is but I did not expect to see one from Euclid. Euclid! What else did that guy do? It is always humbling to learn something from someone that lived over two thousand years ago.

Read moreâ€¦ (1 min remaining to read)
